backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and publishers with permission checks and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, associated files, components, and test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend project files.
frontend/.env: Environment config setting the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup and auth gate integrating all app routes including shepherding visit profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component combining header, sidebar, page outlet, and toast system.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app title, mobile menu toggle, and logout functionality clearing auth and cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar with navigation links, mobile toggle behavior, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with validation, publisher attachment, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Card UI displaying a global note with category badge, preview, timestamp, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal for adding a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year, with form validation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Alert dialog confirming and executing deletion of a pioneer record with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing an existing pioneer, pre-filling fields and updating via mutation with validation.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal form for creating a new publisher with validation, privilege options, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Delet: Empty placeholder file for a dialog to delete a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing an existing publisher, preloading data and submitting updates via mutation.
Empty placeholder file for a modal to edit a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Publi: Empty placeholder file for rendering an individual publisher note.
Empty placeholder file for displaying a section of publisher notes.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit, including publisher selection, date conversion, validation, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a new shepherding visit with form validation, date conversion, and create mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for creating a new task with fields for title, due date, category, and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal form for editing a task, handling field initialization, validation, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for creating a new territory with basic validation and create mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Displays a sorted table of territory checkout history with optional edit actions.
Modal to check out a territory by selecting a publisher and campaign option, then submitting a mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog for deleting a territory note using a delete mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a territory checkout record, including date conversion, validation, and update mutation.
Modal form for editing a territory’s number and type, with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing a single territory note’s content and saving changes via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Displays a territory note with timestamp and edit/delete action buttons.
Manages creating, listing, editing, and deleting notes for a territory using related modals and cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook to add a publisher, mapping UI privilege selections to backend format and invalidating the publishers list.
Mutation hook for checking out a territory to a publisher and refreshing affected territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Creates a global note with validation and invalidates globalNotes queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Mutation hook for creating a pioneer and invalidating the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Creates a shepherding visit entry and triggers refetch of related visit queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Creates a task with required fields and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a new territory with a generated ID and refreshes the territories list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note and invalidates globalNotes queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer by ID and triggers refetch of the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Provides a mutation to delete a publisher with optimistic cache updates and error rollback.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Defines a mutation to delete a task and invalidates the tasks query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Exports queries to fetch all global notes or a single note by ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context provider and hook for Internet Identity login, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Provides a query to fetch all pioneers from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublisherNotes.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports queries to fetch all publishers or a specific publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, updating, and deleting individual shepherding visits.
Defines a query to fetch all shepherding visits.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides queries to fetch tasks by status and to fetch a single task.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Defines a query to fetch all territories.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Exports queries and mutations for fetching, updating, deleting, and changing availability of a single territory.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Implements queries and mutations for managing notes tied to a specific territory.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Defines a mutation to update a territory checkout record and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Provides a mutation to update a global note and invalidate the global notes list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Defines a mutation to update a pioneer and refresh the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Provides a mutation to update a publisher, mapping privilege inputs and invalidating the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Defines a mutation hook to update a task via actor.updateTask and refreshes task queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Provides a mutation hook to update a task's completion state and invalidates task queries afterward.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables including custom Theiarco colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Displays a simple placeholder page with a title and construction icon indicating future functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity authentication with a styled button and layout.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Implements a notes management page with filtering, sorting, add/edit/delete modals, and data fetching.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Shows a list of pioneers with add, edit, and delete functionality and sorted table display.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single publisher with edit and delete options and privilege indicators.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Provides a full publishers list with search, group filtering, inactive toggling, and CRUD modals.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Lists shepherding visits with search, sorting, and a modal to record new visits.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays a single shepherding visit with editable notes and options to edit or delete the visit.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Shows tasks with filtering, completion toggling, and modals for adding, editing, and deleting tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays all territories with status, checkout duration logic, and a modal to add new territories.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows territory details with editing, deletion, checkout management, and checkout history.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides date formatting utilities for notes, tasks, checkouts, and visits based on backend timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, and planned features for building the Shepherding Visits UI including routing and Visit Profile functionality.
